This is a professional development and leadership opportunity for research groups in the biological and biomedical sciences to develop leadership in open research data practices. This opportunity is sponsored by the Federation of American Societies of Experimental Biology, FASEB, as part of its DataWorks! initiative.

**Learn more & nominate your team:**  
**[faseb-dataworks.github.io/2022-openscapes-champions/](https://faseb-dataworks.github.io/2022-openscapes-champions/)**
